snippet: Today we consider the unfamiliar horse. Victor Mather fills us in on this and some of the Olympic sports you may not know much about, including the modern pentathlon and race walking.
abstract: Today we consider the unfamiliar horse. Victor Mather fills us in on this and some of the Olympic sports you may not know much about, including the modern pentathlon and race walking.

headline.main: What We're Watching: An Unfamiliar Horse, of Course
